description: This rule will monitor any office apps that spins up a new LOLBin process. This activity is pretty suspicious and should be investigated. Author: Vadim Khrykov (ThreatIntel), Cyb3rEng (Rule). License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: New Lolbin Process by Office Applications
query: (process.executable:(*regsvr32 OR *rundll32 OR *msiexec OR *mshta OR *verclsid) AND process.parent.executable:(*winword.exe OR *excel.exe OR *powerpnt.exe))
